title: Chinese egg tarts
ingredients: ['For the pastry', '250g plain flour', '1 pinch salt', '140g butter, diced', '4 tablespoons icing sugar', '1 egg', '2 tablespoons cold water', 'Egg custard filling', '250ml water', '150g caster sugar', '3 eggs', '100ml evaporated milk', '1/4 teaspoon vanilla extract']
